title: nee gadhiyaladhu
sahitya:
nee gadiyaladu vErillai kanDaay neeraja nayana



anupallavi



saagarasudai uRai tirumaarbaa sarasija mrudupadayuga

shreekara manasija samaroopaa hrudasujana paridaapa

(nee)



caraNam



paarinil naravuruvoDu piRandum

payan eduvum aDaiyavillai

paamaranadikaamugan maa paadakan kaaN

aarum avaniyil enakku nigaraar

aRivili enakku nee aruLaadadu

tagaadu yaadava kula paalaka

bavadaaraka sukadaayaka

(nee)
